step1Description: Select the destination service for the {{ip}} IP:
step2DescriptionWithNextHop: Are you sure you want to move the {{ip}} IP to {{destinationService}} on {{nextHop}}?
step2DescriptionWithoutNextHop: Are you sure you want to move the {{ip}} IP to {{destinationService}}?
moveIpOnGoingTaskMessage: This IP is already being moved.
moveIpSuccessMessage: The {{ip}} IP will be available in “{{destinationService}}” in a few minutes.
